DOC.detailed_description: Title： Traditional Chinese Medicine Suan Tsao Jen Tang Tian-Wang-Bu-Xin Dan patient primary insomnia . A multi-center , double blind , placebo control clinical trial . ( First year two-years ' project ) Design : Randomized , placebo-controlled trial comprise 3 arm : SZRT , placebo , TWBXD . Setting : The Chung Shan Medical University Affiliated Hospital Taipei City Hospital . Methods : A total 128 subject 20-80 year age history insomnia least 1 month recruit randomly assign SZRT ( n = 48 ) , placebo ( n =32 ) , TWBXD ( n =48 ) instruct take 6 gm 2 time per day SZRT , TWBXD placebo period 4 week . The primary outcome measure mean component score Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) . Secondary outcome parameter global score World Health Organization Quality Life questionnaire - Taiwan brief version , drug consumption count , sleep diary safety profile structure questionnaire .
